WorkItem.ClosedComment: thanks for reporting. This is duplicate of https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/1577
WorkItem.Description:
I tried to install TypeScript 0.9.1.1 on our build server. The setup completes without any errors, but does not install anything (the TypeScript installation directory is missing).

Our build server does not have any version of VS2012 / VS2013 installed.

The setup should be able to install the compiler on machines that do not have any version of Visual Studio.
WorkItem.Summary: TypeScript compiler does not install on a machine without VS2012/VS2013
